thread.section_title: Alhambra Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Just like Home Stay.
thread.title_full: Just like Home Stay. - Review of Alhambra Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Saras Singh C
title: Just like Home Stay.
text:
A small property very close to St Pancreas Intl. Kings cross underground station is 1 minute walking distance. A very very friendly host. Clean & tidy rooms. Home like morning breakfast. High recommendation on staying in this property if you are looking for a good budget hotels around this area.
Nando's restaurant, Starbucks & a few other eateries at walking distance.
Room Tip: ensuite rooms are the best ones. See more room tips
